TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WebPartDisplayModeCancelEventHandler(object sender, WebPartDisplayModeCancelEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WebPartDisplayModeCancelEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WebPartDisplayModeCancelEventHandler(sender As Object, e As WebPartDisplayModeCancelEventArgs)
public delegate void WebPartDisplayModeCancelEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, WebPartDisplayModeCancelEventArgs ^ e);
type WebPartDisplayModeCancelEventHandler = delegate of obj * WebPartDisplayModeCancelEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示处理 类的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发 事件 时，将调用委托中指定的方法。The method specified in the delegate is called when a event is raised. 页面开发人员可以通过将`OnDisplayModeChanging`属性添加到页面中的``元素，并为属性分配自定义方法名称，为 Web 部件事件提供自定义处理程序。Page developers can provide custom handlers for Web Parts events by adding an `OnDisplayModeChanging` attribute to the `` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute. 还可以通过编程方式分配自定义处理程序。A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically. 有关如何订阅事件的详细信息，请参阅[如何：引发和使用事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-raise-and-consume-events.md)。For more information about how to subscribe to an event, see [How to: Raise and Consume Events](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-raise-and-consume-events.md).
